scripts.sync:device: yarn build:staging && env-cmd -f .env.staging.local npx cap sync
scripts.sync:prod:device: yarn build:prod && env-cmd -f .env.production.local npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: yarn updateVersion:android && yarn sync:device && cd android && bundle exec fastlane buildApk --env staging
scripts.build:prod:android: yarn updateVersion:prod:android &&  yarn sync:prod:device && cd android && bundle exec fastlane buildApk --env production
scripts.build:ios: yarn updateVersion:ios && yarn sync:device && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane buildIpa --env staging
scripts.build:prod:ios: yarn updateVersion:prod:ios && yarn sync:prod:device && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane buildIpa --env production
scripts.deploy:android: yarn sync:device && cd android && bundle exec fastlane internal --env staging
scripts.deploy:prod:android: yarn sync:prod:device && cd android && bundle exec fastlane internal --env production
scripts.deploy:ios: yarn sync:device && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane internal --env staging
scripts.deploy:prod:ios: yarn sync:prod:device && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane internal --env production
scripts.deploy:extension: yarn build:staging && cd extension && env-cmd -f .env.staging node deploy.mjs
scripts.deploy:prod:extension: yarn build:prod && cd extension && env-cmd -f .env.production node deploy.mjs
scripts.updateVersion:android: cd android && bundle exec fastlane updateManifest --env staging
scripts.updateVersion:prod:android: cd android && bundle exec fastlane updateManifest --env production
scripts.updateVersion:ios: cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane updateManifest --env staging
scripts.updateVersion:prod:ios: cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane updateManifest --env production
